name: Dr. Adrian Keller
role: Protagonist - Radio Astronomer at Green Bank Observatory
core_wound: Severe social anxiety from childhood bullying. Found safety in numbers and patterns - they don't judge or hurt. Views human interaction as chaotic and threatening.
wants: To understand the signals and prove he's not going insane
needs: To accept that some things cannot be understood, only experienced - to embrace rather than analyze
voice_markers: Overly technical even when describing emotions ('elevated heart rate' instead of 'scared')
Speaks in fragments when stressed - incomplete sentences
Uses mathematical metaphors for everything ('probability of friendship is low')
Long silences, then verbal avalanches of explanation
Starts sentences with 'Objectively speaking...' or 'The data suggests...'
contradiction: Desperate to maintain humanity through logic, but the Change makes him feel more whole than he ever has. Terrified of losing himself while secretly relieved to become something else.
physical_description: Gaunt, pale from too much indoor time, perpetually tired eyes. Hunched posture. Hands shake slightly when not holding something. Wears noise-canceling headphones even when off.

change_progression.stage_1_ch5: Geometric dreams begin, enhanced pattern recognition
change_progression.stage_2_ch15: Develops synesthesia - sees sounds as colors, feels radio waves
change_progression.stage_3_ch30: Emotions flatten, can see 'code' of reality, communicates with other Changed
change_progression.stage_4_ch55: Near-complete transformation, consciousness expanding beyond linear time
